    Method and Description
    io.mangoo.utils.DateUtils.dateToLocalDate(Date)
    As of version 4.4.0, will be removed in 5.0.0 This method is not thread-safe!

    As of version 4.4.0, will be removed in 5.0.0 This method is not thread-safe!

    As of version 4.4.0, will be removed in 5.0.0 This method is not thread-safe!

    As of version 4.4.0, will be removed in 5.0.0 This method is not thread-safe!

    As of release 4.3.0, will be removed in 5.0.0
    io.mangoo.email.Mail.isHtml()
    As of version 4.4.0, will be private in 5.0.0., use Mail.newHtmlMail() instead.

    As of version 4.4.0, replaced by RequestHelper.isPostPutPatch(HttpServerExchange)

    As of release 4.3.0, replaced by Authentication.validLogin(String, String, String), will be removed in 5.0.0

    As of release 4.3.0, replaced by Authentication.rememberMe(boolean), will be removed in 5.0.0
